embed.title: 4-Star Troops Draws.
embed.description: The following is a figure of actual troops draws by an AoW player spending 180M coins between March 23 and March 26, 2021

fields.name: Tips
fields.value:
• Do not spend gems on lucky draws (fusion is cheaper).
• When in doubt, choose a legendary troops over epic troops.
• When in doubt, choose a 9-load troops over single-load troops

fields.name: Info
fields.value: • 1 lucky draw for every 2.7 4-star troops draw

footer.text: Use `{PREFIX}info exp-level` `{PREFIX}info building` for related information.
